attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Michael Gove
attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove is compromising children’s education and futures by continuously undermining the education system, the teaching profession and the achievements of millions of students.

It is an opinion of many that Micheal Gove is not trust worthy.

Ill thought out changes are being implemented at speed, with limited consultation.

The Government Should put forward a motion of no confidence in Micheal Gove.
